meanings.sent2: Don't listen to that fuckhead, they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The class clown was being a real fuckhead today.
meanings.sent4: His boss was a real fuckhead, always criticizing his work.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was portrayed as a true fuckhead, always causing trouble.

meanings.definition: An insulting term used to refer to someone who is stupid or annoying.
meanings.sent1: Why are you acting like such a fuckhead right now?
meanings.sent2: I can't believe that fuckhead cut me off in traffic.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy neighbor was being a real fuckhead about the noise.
meanings.sent4: Her ex-boyfriend was a total fuckhead, always playing mind games.
meanings.sent5: The bully at school was known as the biggest fuckhead around.
